name: guns
description:
This game is just a prototype, but I might make it into more than that. There are currently 3 guns, and grenades.

Controls:
WASD to move

Shift to sprint

Space to jump

G to throw grenades

Left mouse button to shoot

Right mouse button to ADS (Aim Down Sights)

1/2/3 to switch weapons OR Scroll wheel up/down
